content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the cabinet in this query description: "wooden cabinets are on the wall to the left of the kitchen sink.  they are in the corner, to the left of the windows that sit above the sink.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The query describes wooden cabinets located to the left of the kitchen sink, in the corner, and to the left of windows above the sink. In view 4, the kitchen area is visible, and you can see the cabinets on the wall to the left of the sink and windows. This view provides a clear perspective of the kitchen layout, including the placement of the cabinets relative to the sink and windows.

Here is the annotated image of the selected view. 
All objects belonging to the cabinet class is labeled by a unique number (ID) in red color on it.
Please select the object ID that best matches the given query description: "wooden cabinets are on the wall to the left of the kitchen sink.  they are in the corner, to the left of the windows that sit above the sink.".
Carefully analyze the specified conditions (such as shape, color, relative position with surrounding objects) in the given query, then select top-5 best-matched object IDs.
The selected top-5 object IDs should be sorted in descending order of confidence.
The object ID should be chosen from this list [3, 11, 12, 18, 20, 25, 30, 33, 38, 47, 49, 51, 52, 58, 75, 77, 80, 83, 88, 89, 90, 93, 105, 107, 110, 119, 122, 124, 126, 134, 154, 185]
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified and ranked the top-5 target object IDs.
"object_id": A list of5 selected target object IDs. e.g., [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

The query describes wooden cabinets located on the wall to the left of the kitchen sink, in the corner, and to the left of windows above the sink. Based on the image, the kitchen area appears to be on the right side where multiple cabinets are visible. The cabinets in the corner to the left of the windows above the sink are likely to be the ones that match the description. The IDs 110, 105, 88, 90, and 89 are located in the kitchen area and appear to be positioned in a way that matches the description of being in the corner and to the left of the windows above the sink.
